contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Kitajima |JapaneseName= 北島町 |MapImage= Map Kitajima,Tokushima en.png |settlement_type=Town |Region= [[Shikoku region|Shikoku]] |Prefecture= [[Tokushima Prefecture|Tokushima]] |District= [[Itano District, Tokushima|Itano]] |Area_km2= 8.77 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 20,326 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 34 |LatitudeMinutes= 8 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 134 |LongtitudeMinutes= 33 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.kitajima.lg.jp/ Town of Kitajima] }} {{nihongo|'''Kitajima'''|北島町|Kitajima-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Itano District, Tokushima|Itano District]], [[Tokushima Prefecture|Tokushima]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 20,326 and a [[population density|density]] of 2,317.67 persons per km². The total area is 8.77 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.town.kitajima.lg.jp/ Kitajima official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Tokushima Prefecture]] {{Tokushima-geo-stub}}
